title.rendered: Gottwals Books Classic Book Giveaway… National Reading Month

content.rendered:
Through the rest of March, all four Gottwals Books locations will be giving away FREE classics. Here’s how it works:

1. Mention Facebook, this website post, or our e-newsletter
2. Choose your FREE classic from our front displays. You can pick one of these titles: Mansfield Park, Pride and Prejudice, Great Expectations, Crime and Punishment, or Jane Eyre
3. Limit one per family per day

Limit one per family per day
